description: The bright and refreshing watermelon gin cocktail is the perfect drink for a hot summer’s day. The mild astringency of Aperol balances out any sweetness in this combo, while lemon juice keeps it flavorful without being too heavy on your tongue!Club soda adds just enough fizziness to make everything come alive.
name: The Merchant’s Wife
recipeIngredient: 2 chunks Fresh watermelon, cut in 2″x1″ plus wedges for garnish
